title: OCE is Best Place 1v1 Tournament

embed.description: Welcome to the first OCE is Best Place 1v1 Tournament. This one's for you guys.

body:
Hey all. 

I've wanted to host a tournament for a while now but it's taken me up until now to decide to do it. I'm organising this all myself so I appreciate your patience as I figure it all out. If all goes well, I might host some more "alternative" game-mode tournaments in the future.

Without a further ado, I welcome you to the first OCE is Best Place 1v1 Tournament. 

This one's for you guys. 

**General Information**

**Date:** Sunday 24th January 2016
**Chatroom Check In:** 2:00PM AEDT
**Start Time:** 2:30PM AEDT
**Chatroom:** OCE is Best Place
**Tournament Mode:** Double Elimination
**No. of Participants:** Up To 32
**Run Time:** Until all matches are completed.

**Prizes**
**1st.** $10 RP
**2nd.** $5 RP
**3rd.** Summoner Icon of Your Choice

If you want to sign up or find out more information head over to the Challonge page: http://challonge.com/OCEisbestplace1

I hope to see you there!

replies.body: See if you can flag a rioter dude, they are pretty awesome at supporting community tournaments and/or events.
I'm sure they could put me on the map. How would I go do ahead and do that?

> [{quoted}](name=Nijiiyo,realm=OCE,application-id=6jGZAhT1,discussion-id=ya5dHnix,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-01-20T21:50:47.917+0000)
>
> I'm sure they could put me on the map. How would I go do ahead and do that?

Register your event [here](http://events.oce.leagueoflegends.com/) which I believe is the proper method to get their attention with it. 

Otherwise, a red might be browsing the forums and come across this thread :)

I started up filling in the details for a tournament but since 1v1 isn't a supported mode I couldn't go any further. I'm not sure if it comes under "play session" either since it says those are non-competitive. I'll have to look into it more.

Also, all reds are more than welcome to say hi : )

> [{quoted}](name=Nijiiyo,realm=OCE,application-id=6jGZAhT1,discussion-id=ya5dHnix,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2016-01-20T22:52:53.486+0000)
>
> I started up filling in the details for a tournament but since 1v1 isn't a supported mode I couldn't go any further. I'm not sure if it comes under "play session" either since it says those are non-competitive. I'll have to look into it more.
> 
> Also, all reds are more than welcome to say hi : )

Ah Bummer! 

I guess the only other way to summon a red is to draw a pentagram on your monitor and shout the name of one of them three times (not five).
I'm really looking forward to it! Let's hope I win! Hahaha.

Just wondering if you would like to do another tournament? 
I am intrested

I have done other tournaments!

 What exactly are you referring to and are interested in?

Thanks to everyone who came by to play! 

**Polemos** was our champ, **Lunardi** a worthy runner up, and **peel me stiff** not too far behind in third.

I hope to see you all again soon, and new faces are always more than welcome, at the next _OCE is Best Place_ tournament!

There's still time to sign up if you're on the fence about it. Everything should be ready to go for a 2:30pm AEDT start (not AEST as I wrote here, sorry about that) and if you want to start piling into the "OCE is Best Place" chat room now it'll allow for the smoothest start.

> [{quoted}](name=Nijiiyo,realm=OCE,application-id=6jGZAhT1,discussion-id=ya5dHnix,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-01-23T22:45:55.334+0000)
>
> There's still time to sign up if you're on the fence about it. Everything should be ready to go for a 2:30pm AEDT start (not AEST as I wrote here, sorry about that) and if you want to start piling into the "OCE is Best Place" chat room now it'll allow for the smoothest start.

Hi Nijiiyo,

Just wondering, what'll happen if the 32 participant mark isn't hit? Is the tournament still going to proceed? Thanks.
(Ps, do you know anything about the Pacific Peninsula 1v1 that was supposed to have started a couple of days ago? It kinda... vanished, without a single say...

Cheers,
-Anserem

Hey Anserem,

Hitting 32 might have been a tall order for my first comp but it'll go ahead anyway as a Double Elimination so everyone gets to play more. Over time with some street cred it'll get easier to fill up the bracket.

As for the PP 1v1, I was left in the dark as much as you were and I have no clue about it's future either.

If you've got any more questions feel free to throw em my way!

12 spots are left and everyone has until check in to sign up.

Even if we get to the full 32 I think I'll keep it on double elimination so everyone can play more (and some will likely play heaps more). It'll take longer to get through to the end but at least you won't be out of the comp in less than 10 minutes.
Half the bracket is filled up, another 16 spots remain.
